long_description:
# AnyList MCP Server

A full-featured MCP server for [AnyList](https://www.anylist.com/) that lets Claude manage your shopping lists, recipes, meal plans, and recipe collections.

## Capabilities

- **Shopping Lists** — View all lists, list items by category, add items, check off items, delete items, view favorites and recently added items
- **Recipes** — Browse, search, view full details (ingredients & steps), create new recipes, and delete recipes
- **Meal Planning** — View meal plan events, list meal labels (Breakfast/Lunch/Dinner), create and delete meal plan events
- **Recipe Collections** — View and create recipe collections
- **Health Check** — Verify connection to AnyList

Authenticate with your AnyList email and password. Optionally set a default shopping list name.
